survey_name: Adoption and Satisfaction of AI-Powered Personal Fitness Coaches Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user adoption rates and satisfaction levels with AI-powered personal fitness coaching applications.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using an AI-powered personal fitness coaching application?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How long have you been using an AI-powered personal fitness coaching application?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered fitness coach do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with checkboxes and include an 'Other' option for additional features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered fitness coach do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of the AI-powered fitness recommendations?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is labeled at both ends.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the accuracy of the AI-powered fitness recommendations?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the AI-powered fitness coaching application?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.
